channel.title: How to edit ur stats and make ur self a admin!?!
channel.description:
i jus made my new server my 1st 1 ever ^_^ now how do i edit my stats and make my self an admin?!?!
and also if u dont mind how do i add stuff to it like the codes do i jus add it to compile or what?
thanks ^_^

item.title: How to edit ur stats and make ur self a admin!?!
item.dc:creator: @MoparRocksScape MoparRocksScape
item.description:
@MoparRocksScape wrote:

First log off you character. Now go to the Characters Folder and click on the name of your Character. In there search for a line that says Character Rights= 0
Now just change it to 3. 0= Normal Character 1= Moderator 2= Admin 3= Owner
You may have to Compile. Now log on and everything should be set.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit ur stats and make ur self a admin!?!

item.title: How to edit ur stats and make ur self a admin!?!
item.dc:creator: @baller305 baller305
item.description:
@baller305 wrote:

kk first go to characters folder and open up ur caracters file then were it says player rites at top change ir from 0 to 3. then log in to ur server and if ur admin already type ::master this shuld give u max skills!

item.title: How to edit ur stats and make ur self a admin!?!

item.description:

ok i saved then i clicked the compile.bat, do i click C then enter to compile or wat?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 29, 2007, 07:50:21 PM[/size][hr]help!!!111

item.source: How to edit ur stats and make ur self a admin!?!

item.title: How to edit ur stats and make ur self a admin!?!
item.dc:creator: @Modest_Mouse Modest Mouse
item.description:
@Modest_Mouse wrote:

juggalo613:

i did that and i save it and i log on and it switches back to normal

The issue is most likely caused by one of these two options:

  1. You forgot to Compile after you saved the character file (Click compile.bat)
  2. You must be logged out of the account while you do this (The whole time)

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit ur stats and make ur self a admin!?!
item.dc:creator: @pimping_one Pimping One
item.description:
@pimping_one wrote:

go to character folder then click on the persons name u want to make admin and it should look something like this

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = there username
character-password = there pass here

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3249
character-posy = 3434
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 5.130.201.62
character-lastlogin = 20070304
character-energy = 47

[LOOK]

[ITEMS]

[FRIENDS]

[/code]

where it says player rights change to either 1 (mod) 2 (admin) or 3 (owner)

then to have max stats just type ::master
